node.statement: FOUNDATIONS: Definitions, MSS convolution formula, finite free cumulants kappa_k (additive under boxplus), Phi_n = sum_i H_p(lambda_i)^2. Validated structural identities: (i) Phi_n = 2*Sm2 [Proved], (ii) S2(p boxplus q) = S2(p)+S2(q) [Proved], (iii) sum_i H_i*lambda_i = n(n-1)/2 [Proved], (iv) C_n = 4/(n^2(n-1)) [Proved for n=2..14].
